member.summary:
Base class for all objects within PDF hierarchy.
Supported by Compact .NET Edition.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.PDFBaseObject
member.summary: Represents the base class for all objects in a PDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFAction.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the document that owns this action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFAction.Annotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the annotation that uses this action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFAction.Actions
member.summary: Gets the list of actions to be performed after this one.
member.value: An object storing the actions to be performed after current action (this one) has been executed.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode
member.summary: Specifies the available magnification modes when a page is displayed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.XYZ
member.summary: Display the page with the coordinates (left, top) positioned at the top-left corner of the window and the contents of the page magnified by the factor zoom.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.Fit
member.summary: Display the page with its contents magnified just enough to fit the entire page within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the page within the window in the other dimension.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitH
member.summary: Display the page with the vertical coordinate top positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of the page within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitV
member.summary: Display the page with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of the page within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitR
member.summary: Display the page with its contents magnified just enough to fit the rectangle specified by the coordinates left, bottom, right, and top entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the rectangle within the window in the other dimension.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitB
member.summary: Display the page with its contents magnified just enough to fit its bounding box entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically. If the required horizontal and vertical magnification factors are different, use the smaller of the two, centering the bounding box within the window in the other dimension.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitBH
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the vertical coordinate top positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.MagnificationMode.FitBV
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF Go-To action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to navigate to a specific page in the current document. It allows to specify the page to open when this action is executed, the location in the page where the viewer should display the page and a magnification factor to be used when displaying the destination page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.RawAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the destination page for this action.
member.value: A object specifying the page to be displayed when this action is executed.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the top coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the top coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. This value is relative to the top of the page, 0 value meaning that the top of the page will be displayed.
A -1 value for this property means that the current top coordinate used by the viewer will not be changed when dispaying the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes: , , ,

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the left coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the left coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. This value is relative to the left margin of the page, 0 value meaning that the page will be displayed starting from its left margin.
A -1 value for this property means that the current left coordinate used by the viewer will not be changed when dispaying the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes: , , ,

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the bottom coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. It is relative to the top of the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes:

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the right coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the right coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate.
This value is used by the following magnification modes:

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom factor to be used when the page is displayed.
member.value: A float value specifying the zoom factor to be used when the page is displayed.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, it will be magnified using the zoom factor specified by this property. This value is used only in conjunction with magnification mode ( see enumeration) and it is given as percents (100 means 100% zoom).
A 0 value for this property means that the current zoom factor used by the viewer will not be changed when displaying the page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.MagnificationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the magnification mode for destination page.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the magnification mode for the page when it opens in the viewer as a result of executing this action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFGoToAction.DestinationPageID
member.summary: Gets or sets the destination page id.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF Remote Go-To action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to navigate to a specific page in an external pdf document. It allows to specify the page to open when this action is executed, the location in the page where the viewer should display the page and a magnification factor to be used when displaying the destination page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the destination page number (in the remote document) for this action.
member.value: An int value specifying the page to be displayed when this action is executed.
member.remarks: This value is 0 based, first page in the document is 0, the second page is 1, and so on.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.RemoteFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the remote file for this action.
member.value: A string value specifying the full path to the remote pdf document.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the top coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the top coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. This value is relative to the bottom of the page, 0 value meaning that the bottom of the page will be displayed.
A -1 value for this property means that the current top coordinate used by the viewer will not be changed when dispaying the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes: , , ,

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the left coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the left coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. This value is relative to the left margin of the page, 0 value meaning that the page will be displayed starting from its left margin.
A -1 value for this property means that the current left coordinate used by the viewer will not be changed when dispaying the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes: , , ,

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the bottom coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate. It is relative to the bottom of the page.
This value is used by the following magnification modes:

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the right coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.value: A float value specifying the right coordinate in the page where the viewer should display the page.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, the viewer will try to display the page at the given coordinate.
This value is used by the following magnification modes:

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom factor to be used when the page is displayed.
member.value: A float value specifying the zoom factor to be used when the page is displayed.
member.remarks:
When the destination page of this action is displayed, it will be magnified using the zoom factor specified by this property. This value is used only in conjunction with magnification mode ( see enumeration) and it is given as percents (100 means 100% zoom).
A 0 value for this property means that the current zoom factor used by the viewer will not be changed when displaying the page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFRemoteGoToAction.NewWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the remote document opens in current window or in a new window.
member.value: A bool value specifying whether the remote document opens in current window or in a new window. If the remote document opens in the current window, the current pdf file is replaced with the remote document.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFHideAction
member.summary: Defines a PDF hide action.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified form field should be hidden or shown.
member.value: True if the form field should be hidden, false if the form field should be shown.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFHideAction.FieldName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the field that is affected by this action.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFJavaScriptAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF Javascript action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to execute Javascript code within the viewer.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFJavaScriptAction.Script
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript code to be executed when this action is executed.
member.value: A string value representing valid javascript code to be executed.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFLaunchAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF Launch action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to launch an application or to open a document.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFLaunchAction.File
member.summary: Gets or sets the file to be launched by this action.
member.value: An string value specifying the full path to the file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFLaunchAction.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a parameter string to be passed to the launched application.
member.value: An string value specifying the the list of parameters to be passed to the launched application
member.remarks: This property matches the string of parameters as if they were passed to the application in the command line.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFLaunchAction.NewWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the remote document opens in current window or in a new window.
member.value: A bool value specifying whether the remote document opens in current window or in a new window. If the remote document opens in the current window, the current pdf file is replaced with the remote document.
member.remarks: If the file is not a pdf document, this property is ignored.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.NamedAction
member.summary: Specifies the available named actions supported by the viewer.

member.summary: Go to next page in the document.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.NamedAction.PrevPage
member.summary: Go to previous page in the document.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.NamedAction.FirstPage
member.summary: Go to first page in the document.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.NamedAction.LastPage
member.summary: Go to last page in the document.

member.summary: Print the document.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFNamedAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF Named action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to navigate to specific pages in the document or to print the document.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFNamedAction.NamedAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the named action to be executed when this action is executed.
member.value: An enumeration member specifying the action to be executed.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFResetFormAction
member.summary: Defines a SubmitForm action.
member.remarks: This action allows a user to reset the form fields to their default values.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFResetFormAction.Fields
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fields affected by this action.
member.value: A object specifying the list of fields affected by this action.
member.remarks:
The property controls how the fields in this collection are reset.
If property is true, only the fields in this collection will be reset.
If property is false, the fields in this collection are not reset and only the remaining form fields are reset.
If the collection is null or empty, then all the form fields are reset and the property is ignored.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFResetFormAction.ResetFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fields in collection should be reset or not.
member.value: True if the fields in collection should be reset, false otherwise. Default is true.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFResetFormAction.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the action flags (/Flags key of the submit form action.).
member.remarks: Bit 1 is the low order bit and bit 32 is the high order bit.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.SubmitDataFormat
member.summary: Specifies the available data formats for submitting the form data.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.SubmitDataFormat.HTML
member.summary: The field names and values are submitted in HTML Form format.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.SubmitDataFormat.FDF
member.summary: The field names and values are submitted in FDF format.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.SubmitDataFormat.XFDF
member.summary: The field names and values are submitted in XFDF format.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.SubmitDataFormat.PDF
member.summary: The entire PDF file is submitted.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction
member.summary: Defines a SubmitForm action.
member.remarks: This action allows a user to submit the form data to a specified URL.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for submitting the form data.
member.value: A string value specifying the URL where the form data should be submitted.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.DataFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the data being submitted.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the format of the data being submitted.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.Fields
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fields affected by this action.
member.value: A object specifying the list of fields affected by this action.
member.remarks:
The property controls how the fields in this collection are submitted to the specified URL.
If property is true, only the fields in this collection will be submitted.
If property is false, the fields in this collection will not be submitted and only the remaining form fields will be submitted.
If the collection is null or empty, then all the form fields are submitted and the property is ignored.
In any of the situations above, the fields with property set to true will not be submitted.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.SubmitFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fields in collection should be submitted or not.
member.value: True if the fields in collection should be submitted, false otherwise. Default is true.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.IncludeNoValueFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fields with no value should be submitted.
member.value: True if the fields with no value should be submitted, false otherwise. Default is false.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.UseHttpGet
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field names and values should be submitted using HTTP GET method.
member.value: True if the field names and values should be submitted using HTTP GET method. If false, the field names and values are submitted using HTTP POST method. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is or .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.SubmitCoordinates
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the coordinates of the mouse click that caused the submit form action are transmitted as part of form data.
member.value: True if the coordinates of the mouse click that caused the submit form action should be transmitted as part of form data, otherwise false. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.IncludeAppendSaves
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the incremental updates to the underlying PDF document are included in the submitted FDF file.
member.value: True if the incremental updates to the underlying PDF document should be included in the submitted FDF file, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.IncludeAnnotations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the markup annotations in the underlying PDF document are included in the submitted FDF file.
member.value: True if the incremental updates to the underlying PDF document should be included in the submitted FDF file, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.UseCanonicalDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field values representing dates should be submitted using PDF date/time format.
member.value: True if the the field values representing dates should be submitted using PDF date/time format. Default is false.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.ExcludeNonUserAnnotations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether only the annotations whose author is the current user should be submitted.
member.value: True if only the annotations whose author is the current user should be submitted, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is and property is true.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.EmbedForm
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the PDF document is embedded in the submitted FDF file.
member.value: True if the PDF document is embedded in the submitted FDF file, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: This property has meaning only if property is .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFSubmitFormAction.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the action flags (/Flags key of the submit form action.).
member.remarks: Bit 1 is the low order bit and bit 32 is the high order bit.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFURIAction
member.summary: This class represents a PDF URI action.
member.remarks: This type of action allows a user to go to a resource on the Internet, tipically a hypertext link.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Actions.PDFURIAction.URI
member.summary: Gets or sets the uri to be resolved when this action is executed.
member.value: An string value specifying the full URI for the internet resource.
member.remarks:
The value of this property is usually a HTTP url, like below:
action.URI = "http://www.o2sol.com/";

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationMode
member.summary: Specifies the available modes for activating a 3D annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationMode.PageOpen
member.summary: The annotation should be activated as soon as the page containing the annotation is opened.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationMode.PageVisible
member.summary: The annotation should be activated as soon as any part of the page containing the annotation becomes visible.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationMode.ExplicitActivation
member.summary: The annotation should remain inactive until explicitly activated by a script or user action.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationState
member.summary: Specifies the available states upon activation of the 3D annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationState.Instantiated
member.summary: The artwork is instantiated, but real-time script-driven animations are disabled.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivationState.Live
member.summary: Real-time script-driven animations are enabled if present; if not, the artwork is instantiated.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationMode
member.summary: Specifies the available modes for activating a 3D annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationMode.PageClose
member.summary: The annotation should be deactivated as soon as the page is closed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationMode.PageInvisible
member.summary: The annotation should be deactivated as soon as the page containing the annotation becomes invisible.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationMode.ExplicitDeactivation
member.summary: The annotation should remain active until explicitly deactivated by a script or user action.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationState
member.summary: Specifies the available states upon deactivation of the 3D annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationState.Uninstantiated
member.summary: The artwork is uninstantiated.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationState.Instantiated
member.summary: The artwork remains instantiated.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DDeactivationState.Live
member.summary: The artwork remains live.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation
member.summary: Defines how the annotation is activated and deactivated.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DEntity
member.summary: Defines the base class for all 3D related classes.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.ActivationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the activation mode for the annotation.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the circumstances under which the annotation should be activated.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.ActivationState
member.summary: Gets or sets the activation state for the annotation.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the state of the artwork instance upon activation of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.DeactivationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the deactivation mode for the annotation.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the circumstances under which the annotation should be deactivated.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.DeactivationState
member.summary: Gets or sets the deactivation state for the annotation.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the state of the artwork instance upon deactivation of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.ShowToolbar
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar should be displayed when the annotation is activated.
member.value: If true, a toolbar should be displayed by default when the annotation is activated and given focus. If false, a toolbar should not be displayed by default.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DActivation.ShowUI
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the UI for managing the 3D artwork should be displayed when the annotation is activated.
member.value: If true, the user interface should be made visible when the annotation is activated. If false, the user interface should not be made visible by default.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimationType
member.summary: Specifies the available styles for applying light to 3D artwork.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimationType.None
member.summary: Animations are driven through alternate means, such as JavaScript.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimationType.Linear
member.summary: Keyframe animations are driven linearly from beginning to end.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimationType.Oscillating
member.summary: Keyframe animations should oscillate along their time range.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimation
member.summary: Defines the lighting to apply to 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation type.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the animation type.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimation.PlayCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the play count.
member.value: An integer specifying the play count for this animation.
member.remarks: A non-negative integer represents the number of times the animation is played. A negative integer indicates that the animation is infinitely repeated. This value is ignored for animation types of .

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnimation.TimeMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets the time multiplier for the animation.
member.value: A positive number specifying the time multiplier to be used when running the animation.
member.remarks: A value greater than one shortens the time it takes to play the animation, or effectively speeds up the animation. This value is ignored for animation types of .

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DAnnotation
member.summary: Defines a 3D annotation.
member.remarks: 3D annotations allow to include 3D artwork in PDF files.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation
member.summary: Defines an annotation in a PDF file.
member.remarks: This is the base class for all annotations in a PDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.SrcObjectID
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the source PDF annotation this annotation was created from.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the page owning the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Border
member.summary: Gets or sets the border of this object.
member.value: A object specifying the border for this annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the annotation.
member.value: A string value specifying the id of the annotation.
member.remarks: The annotation id is supposed to identify uniquely the annotation on the page. The PDF4NET library does not throw an exception if there are several annotations with the same id on the same page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.LastModified
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the annotation was most recently modified.
member.value: A DateTime value specifying the date and time when the annotation was most recently modified.
member.remarks: When the annotation is created from code, this property is set to current date and time. When the annotation is imported from a PDF file, this property is loaded from the annotation. If the annotation does not include this information, this property will return . If the caption or the contents of an imported annotation are changed, this property is set to current date and time, otherwise it is not modified when the annotation is saved back to file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption of the annotation.
member.value: A string value specifying the caption of the annotation.
member.remarks: This caption is displayed in the title bar of the annotation's pop-up window when open and active.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Contents
member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the annotation.
member.value: A string value specifying the contents of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the flags associated with this annotation.
member.value: One or more enumeration members specifying the flags for this annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the X coordinate of the top left corner of the annotation's rectangle.
member.value: a float value representing the X coordinate of the top left corner of the annotation's rectangle.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the top left corner of the annotation's rectangle.
member.value: a float value representing the Y coordinate of the top left corner of the annotation's rectangle.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the annotation rectangle.
member.value: a float value representing the width of the annotation rectangle.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the annotation rectangle.
member.value: a float value representing the height of the annotation rectangle.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of this annotation object.
member.value: A object specifying the position of the annotation.
member.remarks: This position is relative to the top left corner of the page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of this annotation object.
member.value: A object specifying the size of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Rectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of this annotation object.
member.value: A object specifying the position and size of the annotation.
member.remarks: The bounding rectangle is relative to the top left corner of the page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of this annotation's border.
member.value: A object specifying the color of this annotation's border.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.RawAppearance
member.summary: Gets or sets the appearance of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the annotation.
member.value: a float value representing the opacity of the annotation.
member.remarks: The opacity property is used to control the transparency level of the annotation's visual representation. 0 means full transparency, 100 means full opacity.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.AppearanceCharacteristics
member.summary: Gets or sets the appearanceCharacteristics of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotation.Rotate
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of the annotation.
member.value: The annotation's rotation angle.

member.summary: Gets or sets the annotation appearance.
member.value: A object specifying the visual appearance of the 3D annotation.
member.remarks: The annotation appearance is displayed when the annotation is deactivated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the activation options for the annotation.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DBackground
member.summary: Defines the background appearance for 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DBackground.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color.
member.value: A object specifying the background color for the 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DBackground.ApplyToEntireAnnotation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how the background is applied.
member.value: True if the background is applied to entire annotation, false if the background is applied to annotation's 3D view box only.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection
member.summary: Defines how a portion of the 3D artwork is clipped for the purpose of showing artwork cross sections.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.Center
member.summary: Gets or sets the center of the cutting plane.
member.value: A three element array specifying the center of rotation on the cutting plane in world space coordinates.
member.remarks: If the array has more than 3 elements, only the first 3 will be considered.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the cutting plane.
member.value: A three-element array specifying the orientation of the cutting plane in world space, where each value represents the orientation in relation to the X, Y, and Z axes, respectively.
member.remarks:
If the array has more than 3 elements, only the first 3 will be considered.
Exactly one of the values must be null, indicating an initial state of the cutting plane that is perpendicular to the corresponding axis and clipping all geometry on the positive side of that axis. The other two values must be numbers indicating the rotation of the plane, in degrees, around their corresponding axes. The order in which these rotations are applied should match the order in which the values appear in the array.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the cutting plane opacity.
member.value: A number indicating the opacity of the cutting plane using a standard additive blend mode.
member.remarks: The opacity is given in percents, 100 is full opacity, 0 is no opacity.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the cutting plane color.
member.value: A object specifying the color of the cutting plane.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.IntersectionIsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the intersection of cutting plane with 3D artwork is visible.
member.value: True if the intersection of cutting plane with 3D artwork is visible.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DCrossSection.IntersectionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the intersection color.
member.value: A object specifying the color of the the intersection of cutting plane with 3D artwork.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.None
member.summary: No lights are used.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.White

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Night
member.summary: One yellow, one aqua, and one blue infinite light, no ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Hard
member.summary: Three grey infinite lights, moderate ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Primary
member.summary: One red, one green, and one blue infinite light, no ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Blue
member.summary: Three blue infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Red
member.summary: Three red infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Cube

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.CAD
member.summary: Three grey infinite lights and one light attached to the camera, no ambient term.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DLightingStyle.Headlamp
member.summary: Single infinite light attached to the camera, low ambient term.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the projection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the clipping style for the projection.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DProjection.FarClipDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the far clipping distance.
member.value: The far clipping distance, expressed in the camera coordinate system.
member.remarks:
This property has meaning only if property is .
A negative value for this property disables the far clipping.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DProjection.NearClipDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the near clipping distance.
member.value: The near clipping distance, expressed in the camera coordinate system.
member.remarks:
This property has meaning only if property is or if is .
This property must be non-negative for orthographic projections and greater than 0 for perspective projections.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DProjection.FieldOfView
member.summary: Gets or sets the field of view.
member.value: A number between 0 and 180, inclusive, specifying the field of view of the virtual camera, in degrees.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DProjection.Scaling
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection scaling.
member.value: A positive number that specifies the scaling used when projecting the 3D artwork onto the annotations target coordinate system.
member.remarks:
This property has meaning only if is .
A negative value for this property specifies default scaling for the projection.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DProjection.OrthoScaleMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale mode for orthographic projections.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying a strategy for scaling to fit the near planes x and y coordinates onto the annotations target coordinate system.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle
member.summary: Specifies the available styles for rendering the 3D artwork.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.Solid
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.SolidWireframe
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with single color edges on top of them. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.Transparent
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with an added level of transparency. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.TransparentWireframe
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with an added level of transparency, with single color opaque edges on top of it. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.BoundingBox
member.summary: Displays the bounding box edges of each node. The color of the bounding box edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.TransparentBoundingBox
member.summary: Displays bounding boxes faces of each node with an added level of transparency. The color of the bounding box faces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.TransparentBoundingBoxOutline
member.summary: Displays bounding boxes edges and faces of each node with an added level of transparency. The color of the bounding box edges is determined by the auxiliary color. The color of the bounding boxes faces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.Wireframe
member.summary: Displays only edges in a single color. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.ShadedWireframe
member.summary: Displays only edges and applies lighting. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.HiddenWireframe
member.summary: Displays edges in a single color, though removes back-facing and obscured edges. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.Vertices
member.summary: Displays only vertices in a single color. The color of these points is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.ShadedVertices
member.summary: Displays only vertices, though uses their vertex color and applies lighting. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.Illustration
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with surfaces, removes obscured lines. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color, and the color of the surfaces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.SolidOutline
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with lit and textured surfaces, removes obscured lines. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderStyle.ShadedIllustration
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with lit and textured surfaces and an additional emissive term to remove poorly lit areas of the artwork. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode
member.summary: Defines the style in which the 3D artwork is rendered.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode.AuxiliaryColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the auxiliary color.
member.value: A object specifying the auxiliary color to be used when rendering the 3D image.
member.remarks: Auxiliary color is used by some of the 3D render styles.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode.FaceColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the face color.
member.value: A object specifying the face color to be used when rendering the 3D image.
member.remarks: Face color is used only by Illustration render style.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the style for rendering the 3D artwork.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the style for rendering the 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering opacity.
member.value: A number specifying the opacity of the added transparency applied by some render modes.
member.remarks: The opacity is given in percents, 100 is full opacity, 0 is no opacity.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DRenderMode.CreaseValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the crease value.
member.value: A number specifying the angle to be used as the crease value to be used when determining silhouette edges.
member.remarks: The crease value is specified in degrees, from 0 to 360.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream
member.summary: Defines the stream that contains the 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets content of this stream.
member.value: A byte array that contains the 3D artwork in U3D format.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream.OnInstantiate
member.summary: Gets or sets the code to execute when the 3D artwork is instantiated.
member.value: Javascript code to be executed when the 3D artwork is instantiated.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream.Views
member.summary: Gets the list of views for this 3D artwork.
member.value: A list of objects available for this 3D artwork.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream.DefaultView
member.summary: Gets or sets the default view.
member.value: Index in Views collection.
member.remarks: If there are no views, this value is ignored. If the value is outside of the valid range, the first view is considered to be default.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DStream.Animation
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation for this 3D artwork.
member.value: A object that defines the preferred method that viewer applications should use to drive keyframe animations present in this artwork.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView
member.summary: Defines the parameters to be applied to the virtual camera associated with a 3D annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.ExternalName
member.summary: Gets or sets the view's external name.
member.value: The external name of the view, suitable for presentation in a user interface.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.InternalName
member.summary: Gets or sets the view's internal name.
member.value: The internal name of the view, used to refer to the view from other objects.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.CameraToWorldMatrix
member.summary: Gets or sets the 3D transformation matrix.
member.value: A 12-element 3D transformation matrix that specifies a position and orientation of the camera in world coordinates.
member.remarks: If the array has more than 12 elements, only the first 12 will be considered.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.ViewNodeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the view node.
member.value: The name of a view node in the 3D content stream.
member.remarks: The view node in the content stream defines all the properties for viewing the 3D artwork. If both ViewNodeName and CameraToWorldMatrix are specified, then ViewNodeName takes precedence.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.CenterOfOrbit
member.summary: Gets or sets the center of orbit for 3D artwork.
member.value: A non-negative number indicating a distance in the camera coordinate system along the z axis to the center of orbit for this view.
member.remarks: If this value is negative, the viewer application must determine the center of orbit.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.Projection
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection for this view.
member.value: A object that defines the projection of coordinates in the 3D artwork (already transformed into camera coordinates) onto the target coordinate system of the annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDF3DView.Background
member.summary: Gets or sets the background for this view.
member.value: A object that defines the background over which the 3D artwork is to be drawn.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags
member.summary: Specifies the available flags for an annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.Hidden
member.summary: If set, do not display or print the annotation or allow it to interact with the user.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.Print
member.summary: If set, print the annotation when the page is printed. If clear, never print the annotation, regardless of whether it is displayed on the screen.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.NoZoom
member.summary: If set, do not scale the annotation's appearance to match the magnification of the page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.NoRotate
member.summary: If set, do not rotate the annotation's appearance to match the rotation of the page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.NoView
member.summary: If set, do not display the annotation on the screen or allow it to interact with the user. The annotation may be printed (depending on the Print flag), but should be considered hidden for the purposes of onscreen display and user interaction.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.AnnotationFlags.ReadOnly
member.summary: If set, do not allow the annotation to interact with the user.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMarkupAnnotation
member.summary: Defines a markup annotation on a page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMarkupAnnotation.QuadPoints
member.summary: Gets or sets the points the define the markup annotation.
member.value: An array of points specifying the position of the markup annotation.
member.remarks:
The QuadPoints array must contain 8*n elements specifying the coordinates of n quadrilaterals. Each quadrilateral encompasses a word or group of continuous words in the text underlying the annotation. The coordinates for each quadrilateral are given in the order
x1 y1 x2 y2 x3 y3 x4 y4
specifying the quadrilateral's four vertices in counterclockwise order. The text is oriented with respect to the edge connecting points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2).

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMarkupAnnotation.MarkupStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the markup style for the markup annotation.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the style of the markup annotation.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMovieAnnotation.Poster
member.summary: Gets or sets the movie poster to be displayed on the page when the movie is not playing.
member.value: A string value specifying the movie poster to be displayed on the page when the movie is not playing.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMovieAnnotation.ImportedPoster
member.summary: Gets or sets the imported movie poster to be displayed on the page when the movie is not playing.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMovieAnnotation.ShowPlayerControls
member.summary: Gets or sets whether player control interface should be displayed while playing the movie.
member.value: True if the player control interface should be displayed, false otherwise.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMovieAnnotation.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the movie clip.
member.value: A float value specifying the duration of the movie clip.
member.remarks:
If this property is -1, the actual movie duration is used for playing the movie. If this property is 0, the duration is infinity.
If the duration is greater than actual movie duration, when the movie ends, the player displays the last frame till the specified duration elapses. If the duration is lower than actual movie duration, the movie ends when the duration elapses.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Annotations.PDFMovieAnnotation.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets the action associated with this annotation.
member.value: A object specifying the action associated with this annotation.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField
member.summary: Defines a field in a PDF form.
member.remarks: This is the base class for all field types in a PDF form.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ActivateFirstWidget
member.summary: Activates the first field widget within the page or document.
member.remarks:
A field can appear multiple times on a PDF page or in a PDF document. Each visible representation of the field is called widget. This method sets the first widget of the field as active. This means that the Appearance properties of the field will correspond to the first widget of the field within the page or document. First widget does not necessary mean that it is the first visible field widget on the page or document.
If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of a page, then this method activates the first field widget on the page. If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of the document, then this method activates the first field widget within the whole document.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ActivateLastWidget
member.summary: Activates the last field widget within the page or document.
member.remarks:
A field can appear multiple times on a PDF page or document. Each visible representation of the field is called widget. This method sets the last widget of the field as active. This means that the Appearance properties of the field will correspond to the last widget of the field within the page or document. Last widget does not necessary mean that it is the last visible field widget on the page or document.
If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of a page, then this method activates the last field widget on the page. If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of the document, then this method activates the last field widget within the whole document.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ActivateNextWidget
member.summary: Activates the next field widget within the page or document.
member.remarks:
A field can appear multiple times on a PDF page or document. Each visible representation of the field is called widget. This method sets the next widget of the field (relative to current one) as active. This means that the Appearance properties of the field will correspond to the next appearance of the field within the page or document.
If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of a page, then this method activates the next field widget on the page. If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of the document, then this method activates the next field widget within the whole document.
member.returns: True if the next widget exists and can be activated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ActivatePreviousWidget
member.summary: Activates the previous field widget within the page.
member.remarks:
A field can appear multiple times on a PDF page or document. Each visible representation of the field is called widget. This method sets the previous widget of the field (relative to current one) as active. This means that the Appearance properties of the field will correspond to the previous widget of the field within the page or document
. If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of a page, then this method activates the previous field widget on the page. If the field reference was obtained using the Fields collection of the document, then this method activates the previous field widget within the whole document.
member.returns: True if the previous widget exists and can be activated, false otherwise.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the document owning the field

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the page that includes the field.
member.remarks: This property has a temporary value and it depends on how the field reference was obtained. If the field references was obtained from the document, this property is null. If the field reference was obtained from a page, then this property will be that page.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent field of this field

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Kids
member.summary: Gets the list of kids for this field. The list can include both PDFField object and PDFWidgetAnnotation objects.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.FDFObjectID
member.summary: Gets or sets the field's object id when saved to a FDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ActiveAnnotationIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of active annotation for this field.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the field.
member.value: A string value specifying the name of the field.
member.remarks:
The name of the field is defined in the PDF file and it can not be changed.
A field can be located in the collection of class by its name.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.PartialName
member.summary: Gets the partial name of the field.
member.remarks: Partial name is the name of the field when it belongs to a field hierarchy. The Name is the fully qualified name, while the partial name is the name of a field node. For fields with no parents, partial name is the same with name.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.MappingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the mapping name of the field.
member.value: A string value specifying the mapping name of the field.
member.remarks: The field's mapping name is used when exporting interactive form field data from the document.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Tooltip
member.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip of the field.
member.value: A string value specifying the tooltip of the field.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the field.
member.value: A string value specifying the value of the field, formatted as string.
member.remarks:
This property gives access to the field value as a string. Specific field types give access to field value as a native type.
Fields with a fixed range of values (checkboxes, radiobuttons, listboxes and comboboxes) will throw an exception if the value does not exist in their set of values.
member.exception: The value does not exist in field's specific set of values.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Modified
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the field's original value has changed.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field is read-only.
member.value: True if the field is read-only, false otherwise. Default is false.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field is required.
member.value: True if the field is required, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: If true, the field must have a value when it is exported by a submit-form action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.NoExport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field can be exported or not.
member.value: True if the field can not be exported, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: If true, the field must not be exported by a submit-form action.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Align
member.summary: Gets or sets the text alignment in a field.
member.value: A enumeration member specifying the text alignment in a field.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.UpdateInProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field update is in progress or not.
member.value: True if the field update is in progress, false otherwise.
member.remarks: If this flag is true, then the corresponding XFA field is not sinchronized. This flag is used to avoid infinite recursion when synchronizing fields (field xfaA is updated and tried to sync with acroA. acroA is updated because of sync and it triggers a new update of xfaA. This would go infinitely without this flag).

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.FieldInfo
member.summary: Gets additional information about the form field.
member.remarks:
For fields with a single representation (textboxes, checkboxes, comboboxes and listboxes), this array has only one element, but for fields with multiple representations (radiobuttons), this array has an element for each radiobutton.
This property can be null if field extended info can not be read from the PDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.Actions
member.summary: Gets the actions to be performed by this field in response to field events.
member.value: A object specifying the actions to be performed in response to field events.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.CalcOrderIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the calculation order for this field.
member.value: An integer value specifying the calculation order for this field.
member.remarks: This property applies only to fields that have a action and it defines the order of calculating the fields. The field with the lowest order index is calculated first and the field with the highest order index is calculated last. Fields with 0 order index are not calculated.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.TabOrderIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the tab order for this field.
member.value: An integer value specifying the tab order for the active field widget.
member.remarks: The field widget with the lowest tab order index gets the focus first and the field widget with the highest tab order index gets the focus last. Field widgets with negative tab order index are assigned automatically with a tab order index when the file is saved and they are always placed at the end of the fields list.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.WidgetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of field widgets.
member.value: The number of field widgets.
member.remarks: If the field reference was obtained from a page, then this property returns the number of field widgets at page level, otherwise it returns the number of field widgets at document level.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.WidgetDocumentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of field widgets at document level.
member.value: The number of field widgets at document level.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField.ChildFieldsCount
member.summary: Gets the number of direct child fields.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFDropDownListField.CheckSpelling
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the field content should be checked for spelling erorrs.
member.value: True if the field content should be checked for spelling erorrs, false otherwise. Default is true.
member.remarks: The field content is checked for spelling errors only when the PDF file is opened in the viewer (if the PDF viewer support this feature) and it is not spell checked when its value is set from code. This flag has meaning only if is true.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFDropDownListField.CommitOnSelChange
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the selected item is commited as soon as the selection is made.
member.value: True if the selected item is commited as soon as the selection is made, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: If set, the new value is committed as soon as a selection is made with the pointing device. This option enables applications to perform an action once a selection is made, without requiring the user to exit the field. If clear, the new value is not committed until the user exits the field.

member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a collection.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFields.Add(O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFField)
member.summary: Adds a new field to the collection.
member.param: The field to be added on the page.
member.exception:
Thrown when the field is added to the Fields collection of a object.
or
Thrown when the page is not included in a document.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFields.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the field from the page or document.
member.param: The name of the field that will be removed.
member.remarks:
This method has different behaviors, depending whether it has been called at document or at page level.
If this method is called at document level (on document's Fields collection), then it removes the field completely from the document.
If this method is called at page level (on page's Fields collection), then the field is removed completely from the page. If the field appears also on other pages, those instances remain in the document.
member.exception: Thrown when the field with the given name does not exist.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFields.Remove(System.String,O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.FieldRemoveOptions)
member.summary: Removes the field from the page or document.
member.param: The name of the field that will be removed.
True if all the field widgets should be removed.
member.remarks:
This method has different behaviors, depending whether it has been called at document or at page level.
If this method is called at document level (on document's Fields collection), then it removes the field completely from the document and the removeOptions parameter has no effect.
If this method is called at page level (on page's Fields collection), then if removeOptions parameter is , then the field is removed completely from the page, otherwise only the active widget is removed. The removeOptions parameter has effect at page level only if the field has multiple widgets on the page (the field appears multiple times on the page). If the field appears only once on the page, the removeOptions parameter has the same effect, no matter what option is used.
member.exception: Thrown when the field with the given name does not exist.

member.name: M:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFields.RenameField(System.String,System.String,O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.FieldRenameOptions)
member.summary: Renames a field in the collection.
member.param: The old field name.
The new field name.
Options that specify how the rename operation is handled.
member.remarks:
If the field has only one widget, then renameOptions parameter has no effect.
If the field has multiple widgets, then if renameOptions parameter is , then the active field widget is renamed. if renameOptions parameter is , then all field widgets at page or document level are renamed, based on the on owner of the Fields collection. If the owner of the Fields collection is the document, then all field widgets in the document are renamed. If the owner of the Fields collection is a page, then all field widgets on that page are renamed.
member.exception: Thrown when the field with the oldName does not exist or when newName is empty or a null reference (Nothing in VB.NET).

member.summary: Gets or sets the action to be executed when the field loses the input focus.

member.remarks: When this action is set at field level, it is applied to all field widgets.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFieldActions.KeyPress
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript action to be executed when the user types a keystroke.
member.value: A object specifying the action to be executed when the user types a keystroke.
member.remarks:
This property specifies a JavaScript action to be performed when the user types a keystroke into a text field or combo box or modifies the selection in a scrollable list box. This action can check the keystroke for validity and reject or modify it.
This action has no meaning for , and fields.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFieldActions.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript action to be executed for formating the field value.
member.value: A object specifying the action to be executed for formating the field value.
member.remarks:
This property specifies a JavaScript action to be performed before the field is formatted to display its current value. This action can modify the fields value before formatting.
This action has no meaning for , , and fields.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFieldActions.Validate
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript action to be executed for validating the field value.
member.value: A object specifying the action to be executed for validating the field value.
member.remarks:
This property specifies a JavaScript action to be performed when the fields value is changed. This action can check the new value for validity.
This action has no meaning for , , and fields.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFFieldActions.Calculate
member.summary: Gets or sets the JavaScript action to be executed for calculating the field value.
member.value: A object specifying the action to be executed for calculating the field value.
member.remarks:
This property specifies a JavaScript action to be performed to recalculate the value of this field when that of another field changes. The order in which the documents fields are recalculated is defined by the property.
After setting this property, the property needs to be set to a value greater than 0.
This action has no meaning for , , and fields.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFForm.NeedAppearances
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether field appearances need to be built by the PDF viewer application.
member.value: True if the PDF viewer application needs to build the field appearances.
member.remarks: This flag instructs the PDF viewer application to ignore the field appearances defined in the field and rebuild them from scratch when the PDF file is displayed.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFListBoxField
member.summary: Defines a scrollable list box field for user input in the PDF file.

member.summary: Gets the visual appearance of this field.
member.value: A object specifying the visual appearance of the field.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFListBoxField.Sort
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the items in the drop down list should be sorted alphabetically or not.
member.value: True if the items are sorted, false otherwise. Default is false.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDF4NET.Forms.PDFListBoxField.CommitOnSelChange
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the selected item is commited as soon as the selection is made.
member.value: True if the selected item is commited as soon as the selection is made, false otherwise. Default is false.
member.remarks: If set, the new value is committed as soon as a selection is made with the pointing device. This option enables applications to perform an action once a selection is made, without requiring the user to exit the field. If clear, the new value is not committed until the user exits the field.
